messages.subject: PMK Saitou Scans on Streamload
messages.msgSnippet: I have received permission to host manga scanlations of Peacemaker Kurogane Saitou at http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3/ from fifay.net (who will also
messages.messageBody:
I have received permission to host manga scanlations of Peacemaker
Kurogane Saitou at
http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3/
from fifay.net (who will also add a link to our board in their next
update)
NOT the entire manga...I'm just concentrating on Saitou's first
appearance which is as far the translators got.

same password: makoto
and only 5.24 mb zipped

I hope these scans of PMK Saitou will be useful for those of you who
do fanart/fanfic because even if you saw the anime you may not have
noticed that Saitou "moves" differently...like how he stoops to look
at people really close (in the manga it just more obvious) and
Nagakura calls Saitou "that" as if Saitou wasn't human or something
(Nagakura even apologizes for saying this)...and the whole bit with
the notion of a 2nd movement (ninja like move)...lastly there is a
tiny part that points out to the audience that Saitou was literally in
the background of various scenes...you just don't notice it. I also
happen to love PMK Saitou's hair :) and how Nanae draws people's hair.

*Reminder*
A LOVE STORY OF SAITOU HAJIME (sadly, it seems the the writer for Kaze
Hikaru beat us to it---the story is about a young lady who literally
can't keep her hands off of S.H.! <<< how's that for a teaser?)
http://www.fifay.net/projects/lovestory01.html
